Jehovah-Jireh - The Lord will provide

Scholarships >

Full scholarships available through Step Up for Students!

Step Up for Students is an initiative of the Florida Tax Credit (FTC) Scholarship Program. The innovative program provides K-12 education scholarships for qualifying low-income students who are entering kindergarten through fifth grade OR who attended public school the previous year. The scholarships give low-income parents the opportunity to choose the K-12 school that best meets their children's needs.

Step Up for Students 2013-14

We are excited to announce that the Step Up For Students 2013-14 application season for RENEWAL FAMILIES is now open! The application season for NEW FAMILIES will open in early March. Scholarships are awarded on a first-come, first-served basis (giving priority to renewal families). Please apply as soon as possible!

This year, they have made enhancements to the online application that may result in much more efficient electronic approval for some renewal families. If your renewal application is able to be electronically verified, you will see an approval message and award letter(s) sooner than in the past when you check the application status within the secured parent login. In this case, you DO NOT need to submit additional supporting documentation. As always, you should download your award letter(s) and submit it/them to the school.

To enhance communications, if you would like to receive periodic text messages throughout the year from Step Up For Students, please text 'school' to 28766.*

*Msg and data rates may apply. Receive up to one message/week. Text 'help' for help, text 'stop' to cancel. Terms & conditions at www.mztxt.com/terms.

Applying for the Scholarship

For a scholarship application please log on to stepupforstudents.com. Once you receive the award, e-mail JES with the Award Letter Student I.D. located at the top of your award letter. We will then input it into the system for full compliance.
